original_text: And they went to the entrance of Gedor, even unto the east side of the valley, to seek pasture for their flocks.
korean_text: 그들이 그들의 양 떼를 위하여 목장을 구하고자 하여 골짜기 동쪽 그돌 지경에 이르러

sentences.original_text: And they went to the entrance of Gedor
even unto the east side of the valley
to seek pasture for their flocks
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 양떼를 위한 목초지를 찾기 위해
